params.data: The data to pass along with the call
params.value: The ether value of the execution

params.commands: The commands to be executed by the Weiroll VM.
The commands to be executed by the Weiroll VM.

amount().notice: The amount of tokens deposited into this wallet from the recipeKernel

execute(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Execute a generic call to another contract.

executeWeiroll(bytes32[],bytes[]).notice: Execute the Weiroll VM with the given commands.

forfeit().notice: Forfeit all rewards to get control of the wallet back

isForfeitable().notice: Returns whether or not the wallet is forfeitable

lockedUntil().notice: The timestamp after which the wallet may be interacted with

manualExecuteWeiroll(bytes32[],bytes[]).notice: Execute the Weiroll VM with the given commands.

marketHash().notice: Returns the hash of the market associated with this weiroll wallet

owner().notice: The address of the offer creator (owner)

recipeKernel().notice: The address of the recipeKernel exchange contract

@notice Also allow a fallback with no logic if erroneous data is provided
